Text: YES ! THE 80's FOREVER!  ..... as a rarity, do you by any chance have in your collection "Samurai Stomp" by Australian band Samurai Trash ..... and ..... "Surface Tension" by an ex-member of Pseudo Echo in his synth band Talk That Walk ?
what a fantastic mix of some very very odd rare 80's songs.......thank you very very much

excellent...I can fill in my missing 80's music knowledge ( I was in Japan for 4 years )
cheers much appreciated...
Cool, thanks, time for a stroll down memory lane

I found this through usenet and tracked it back to here. I regonized about 30% of the songs, some of which I hadn't heard since my teen years.

I'm so impressed that I've also started to get the other volumes.

Thank you so very much.
pixelgazer, you're very welcome. hope you enjoy them.

I've just downloaded "Mouth of an Angel" of a band called "Two People", and this is pretty good. Never heard the song before or even knew the band itself.

Usually i listen to old school metal but there is something about 80z popmusic wich i just really like, shame on me ;). I think i'll just download all of it...hihi.

Thanx man!
music to solve your Rubik's cube by...thanks much!
the lead singer of seona dancing is the actor comedian ricky gervais .....thats a fact.
